message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. It's a rare opportunity to get a top-notch item at a discounted price. I'm willing to let it go for a steal, but you have to act fast. It's a one-time offer, and I'm confident you'll love it.
Okay, I'll take it. Thanks for the deal!
